channel.title: Hello, I'm Steve founder of FTPloy
channel.description:
Hi Guys!
I've already broken the rules and posted, but here's my intro :smiley:
I'm the founder (and designer, developer, support, marketing…) of http://FTPloy.com, a git deployment SaaS enabling developers to deploy sites from GitHub or Bitbucket using FTP or SSH. The site is built on Laravel 4, recently ported for 3 and we're currently working on iOS and Android apps.

item.title: Hello, I'm Steve founder of FTPloy
item.dc:creator: rglover
item.description:
@steve228uk oh, nice. I’ve been using Beanstalk to do a deploy for clients but I think I’ll sign up for you before I do their next push

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, I'm Steve founder of FTPloy

item.title: Hello, I'm Steve founder of FTPloy
item.dc:creator: steve228uk
item.description:
Ah thanks Ryan! Yeah, going well. We left beta a couple of months back and rolled out a pretty big update last month

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, I'm Steve founder of FTPloy

Hey Steve, I tried out FTPloy awhile back (I think you were still in beta) and it was really cool! Hope it’s going well for you.
